page_content.page_text: \tYou're travelling to a distance city (that you’ve never been to before) to find work. As you get close to the city, you hear what sounds like a small fight a little off the path. You venture closer to see what is happening. Three guards are trying to trap one man. The man looks to be a weary traveller like yourself, wearing cheap leather clothes, and also like yourself, has a descent sword.\n\nWhat do you do?

button.button_text: Continue to the city, this has nothing to do with you.
Help the guards. Maybe they can help you can get a job.
Attack the guards, this isn’t a fair fight, and you like to fight!
Wait and see if someone drops something shiny!

page_content.page_text: \tAnother group of guards finds you. They draw their weapons and start to speak in a language you don’t understand. \n\nWhat do you do?

button.button_text: Try to explain yourself. You did nothing wrong.
Attack the guards! Who the h*ll are they!

page_content.page_text: \tYou try to help the guards, but end up killing the person they were trying to capture. The guards speak in a language that you don’t understand, but one of them points to you and says "murderer". \n\nWhat do you do?

button.button_text: Try to explain yourself. You were trying to help!
Attack the guards! You can take them!

page_content.page_text: \tThe two of you end up killing the three guards. The person you helped looks at you suspiciously and doesn’t put his sword away. \n\nWhat do you do?

button.button_text: Start to loot the bodies of the guards, but keeping an eye on the other guy.
Leave the area, but keep an eye on the other guy.

page_content.page_text: \tThe guards don’t understand you and attack you. You are caught off guard and killed.
\tYou kill everyone! All the loot is yours!
\tYou escape, but you dare not go to the city. You start your travels in another direction.
\tThe man ends up trusting you somewhat. He puts his sword away, and helps you loot the bodies. The two of you decide to travel together, but not to the city.
